summary: The Founder of Ethereum is a cat lover, and his favorite feline Friend has come to his Network to Spread some meowgnificent cheers and profits for each and everyone who'll put their trust on Hemule! - Vitalik Buterin has always been quiet about his private life, which includes his fondness (or non-fondness) for animals. However, through his mother, Maia's, Twitter account, a startling fact was revealed: Mr. Buterin is actually a cat lover and his favorite cat's name is Hemule!
